titles.title: Preventive Services for Victims of Violence Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish demonstration projects to prevent mental illnesses and substance abuse among victims of sexual assault or family violence.

term.name: Federal aid to child health services

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Preventive Services for Victims of Violence Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide grants for demonstration projects for the prevention of mental illnesses and substance abuse among: (1) children who have been victims of physical or sexual abuse; and (2) adults who have been victims of sexual assault or family violence, including childhood physical or sexual abuse. Authorizes appropriations.
